response: In Value Investing, I firmly believe in focus on intrinsic value and invest in companies with strong fundamentals and great management. This philosophy has been the foundation of our success, particularly with Value Investment Strategy.

My leadership philosophy centers on empowering great managers and maintaining a long-term perspective. This approach has proven particularly effective in Value Investing, where clear direction is crucial.

The development of Value Investment Strategy stands out as a key milestone in my career. It demonstrated how focus on intrinsic value and invest in companies with strong fundamentals and great management can transform Value Investing.
